text: Pavel Lesh (7 May 1887 - 12 February 1915) was a Russian sports shooter. He competed in four events at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:1915 deaths Category:Russian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Russia Category:Shooters at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ardahan
title: Pavel Lesh
